title: Sam Broadcaster 4.2.2
description: SAM Broadcaster is a professional DJ system with the ability to stream audio over the internet to listeners across the world. SAM Broadcaster is actually much more than just a \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"DJ system\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" - it is a COMPLETE radio automation solution - a radio station in a box. SAM Broadcaster was specifically designed with the needs of online broadcasters in mind. SAM is UNBEATABLE in price, features and power!
